refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The use of SeeAlso in an IndexTerm indicates that the reader should be directed elsewhere in the index for additional information.
The content of SeeAlso identifies another term in the index that the reader should consult in addition to the current term.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: This element provides data for processing but is not rendered in the primary flow of text.
